name: Escape 303 DEMO
description:
Escape 303 DEMO            is an Adventure Platformer Storygame Made by AJB GAMES STUDIO Game story :  
You are ( Player ) in an Island , Under Hands of a Secret Organization it works to transform humans into Robots , You Should escape from this Island by Passing lot of obstacles 
GOOD LUCK HERO 

CONTROLS : 

A , D MOVING SPACE JUMPING DOUBLE A OR DOUBE D MORE SPEEDAA , DD WHILE CATCHING A ROPESWINGING SHIFT SLIDING FUSING ITEMS F DRAGING F GRAPLING
